alert.note: Alert for Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 13 at 3:49PM MST until December 14 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches, with higher amounts across far eastern Johnson County. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Southern Johnson County. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility to near whiteout conditions, including on Interstate 25. Road closures are likely.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
